description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee
species subgroup at time of data collection – WKPRC chimpanzee group a or b/ etc
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
joint attention condition (watching together) or disjoint attention condition (control)
order of the conditions indicating which condition was presented first to the participant– ja_first / da_first
time in seconds it took the participant to enter the approach area in joint attention condition (watching together) or disjoint attention condition (control)
time in seconds spent looking at the screen in the condition
time in seconds spent looking at the experimenter in the condition
whether the participant was excluded – yes/no
